languages.text: Корабль Вольного Торговца заходит на выгодную позицию, готовясь поразить недвижимое судно. Из корабельных орудий вырывается яростный залп, но снаряды беспомощно проносятся сквозь блеклый корпус крейсера и тают в космической мгле. "Плач королевы" растворяется во тьме и неестественно быстро возникает с левого борта, набирая скорость.

traits.locale_text: Корабль Вольного Торговца заходит на выгодную позицию, готовясь поразить недвижимое судно. Из корабельных орудий вырывается яростный залп, но снаряды беспомощно проносятся сквозь блеклый корпус крейсера и тают в космической мгле. "Плач королевы" растворяется во тьме и неестественно быстро возникает с левого борта, набирая скорость.

languages.text: The Rogue Trader's flagship takes an advantageous position, ready to engage the motionless vessel. A powerful salvo erupts from the cannons, but the missiles impotently pass right through the cruiser's withered hull and dissolve in the darkness of space. The Queen's Lament dissipates in the darkness and, with unnatural swiftness, appears at the portside of the flagship, gaining speed.

"Плач королевы" растворяется во тьме и неестественно быстро возникает с левого борта, набирая скорость.

A powerful salvo erupts from the cannons, but the missiles impotently pass right through the cruiser's withered hull and dissolve in the darkness of space. Queen's Lament dissipates in the darkness and, with unnatural swiftness, appears at the portside of the flagship, gaining speed.

The Rogue Trader's flagship takes an advantageous position, ready to engage the motionless vessel. A powerful salvo erupts from the cannons, but the missiles impotently pass right through the cruiser's withered hull and dissolve in the darkness of space. The Queen's Lament dissipates in the darkness and, with unnatural swiftness, appears at the portside of the flagship, gaining speed.

languages.text: 行商浪人的旗舰占据了有利位置，准备与这艘一动不动的舰船交战。宏炮齐声轰鸣，但炮火却无力地穿过了那艘巡洋舰枯萎的船体，消失在黑暗的太空中。女王挽歌号在黑暗中消散，随后又以诡异的机动性出现在旗舰的左舷，加速朝旗舰冲来。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's flagship takes an advantageous position, ready to engage the motionless vessel. A powerful salvo erupts from the cannons, but the missiles impotently pass right through the cruiser's withered hull and dissolve in the darkness of space. The Queen's Lament dissipates in the darkness and, with unnatural swiftness, appears at the portside of the flagship, gaining speed.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人的旗舰占据了有利位置，准备与这艘一动不动的舰船交战。宏炮齐声轰鸣，但炮火却无力地穿过了那艘巡洋舰枯萎的船体，消失在黑暗的太空中。女王挽歌号在黑暗中消散，随后又以诡异的机动性出现在旗舰的左舷，加速朝旗舰冲来。

languages.text: 自由開拓者の旗艦が有利な位置を確保し、停止した船と交戦する準備を整える。 大砲から強力な一斉射撃が放たれるが、ミサイルは無力にも巡洋艦の古びた船体を貫通し、宇宙の闇に溶けていった。女王の挽歌号は闇に消え、不自然な速さで旗艦の左舷に現れ、さらに速度を上げる。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's flagship takes an advantageous position, ready to engage the motionless vessel. A powerful salvo erupts from the cannons, but the missiles impotently pass right through the cruiser's withered hull and dissolve in the darkness of space. The Queen's Lament dissipates in the darkness and, with unnatural swiftness, appears at the portside of the flagship, gaining speed.

traits.locale_text: 自由開拓者の旗艦が有利な位置を確保し、停止した船と交戦する準備を整える。 大砲から強力な一斉射撃が放たれるが、ミサイルは無力にも巡洋艦の古びた船体を貫通し、宇宙の闇に溶けていった。女王の挽歌号は闇に消え、不自然な速さで旗艦の左舷に現れ、さらに速度を上げる。

languages.text: La nave insignia {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente se coloca en una posición ventajosa, lista para atacar a la nave inmóvil. Una potente salva sale de los cañones, pero los misiles atraviesan impotentes el deteriorado casco de la nave y desaparecen en la oscuridad del espacio. El Lamento de la Reina desaparece en la oscuridad y, con una rapidez antinatural, aparece a babor del buque insignia, ganando velocidad.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's flagship takes an advantageous position, ready to engage the motionless vessel. A powerful salvo erupts from the cannons, but the missiles impotently pass right through the cruiser's withered hull and dissolve in the darkness of space. The Queen's Lament dissipates in the darkness and, with unnatural swiftness, appears at the portside of the flagship, gaining speed.

traits.locale_text: La {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente se coloca en una posición ventajosa, lista para atacar a la nave inmóvil. Una potente {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoSalvoSpace}salva{/g} sale de los cañones, pero los misiles atraviesan impotentes el deteriorado {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}casco{/g} de la nave y desaparecen en la oscuridad del espacio. El Lamento de la Reina desaparece en la oscuridad y, con una rapidez antinatural, aparece a babor del buque insignia, ganando {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}velocidad{/g}.

languages.text: Das Flaggschiff {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} nimmt eine vorteilhafte Position ein, um das reglose Schiff anzugreifen. Eine mächtige Salve bricht aus den Geschützen hervor, doch die Projektile fliegen ohne jede Wirkung durch die ramponierte Hülle des Kreuzers und lösen sich in der Dunkelheit des Raums auf. Die Klage der Königin verschwindet in der Dunkelheit und taucht mit unnatürlicher Geschwindigkeit auf der Backbordseite des Flaggschiffs auf, und sie wird noch schneller.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's flagship takes an advantageous position, ready to engage the motionless vessel. A powerful salvo erupts from the cannons, but the missiles impotently pass right through the cruiser's withered hull and dissolve in the darkness of space. The Queen's Lament dissipates in the darkness and, with unnatural swiftness, appears at the portside of the flagship, gaining speed.

traits.locale_text: Das Flaggschiff {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} nimmt eine vorteilhafte Position ein, um das reglose Schiff anzugreifen. Eine mächtige Salve bricht aus den Geschützen hervor, doch die Projektile fliegen ohne jede Wirkung durch die ramponierte Hülle des Kreuzers und lösen sich in der Dunkelheit des Raums auf. Die Klage der Königin verschwindet in der Dunkelheit und taucht mit unnatürlicher Geschwindigkeit auf der Backbordseite des Flaggschiffs auf, und sie wird noch schneller.

languages.text: Le vaisseau amiral {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} adopte une position avantageuse, prêt à attaquer l'astronef immobile. Les canons tirent une puissante salve, mais les missiles impuissants passent à travers la coque délabrée du croiseur avant de se perdre dans les ténèbres du néant intersidéral. La Complainte de la Reine disparaît à son tour, puis réapparaît avec une rapidité surnaturelle sur le flanc bâbord du vaisseau tout en prenant de la vitesse.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's flagship takes an advantageous position, ready to engage the motionless vessel. A powerful salvo erupts from the cannons, but the missiles impotently pass right through the cruiser's withered hull and dissolve in the darkness of space. The Queen's Lament dissipates in the darkness and, with unnatural swiftness, appears at the portside of the flagship, gaining speed.

languages.text: Hür Tacir'in sancak gemisi, avantajlı bir pozisyon alarak hareketsiz gemiyle çatışmaya hazır hâle geliyor. Toplardan güçlü bir salvo atılıyor ancak füzeler, etkisiz bir şekilde kruvazörün yıpranmış gövdesinden geçerek uzayın karanlığında çözülüyor. Kraliçenin Matemi, karanlıkta yok olup doğaüstü bir hızla sancak gemisinin iskele tarafında beliriyor.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's flagship takes an advantageous position, ready to engage the motionless vessel. A powerful salvo erupts from the cannons, but the missiles impotently pass right through the cruiser's withered hull and dissolve in the darkness of space.
